DESCRIPTION: Microcanonical ensemble (NVE): the ensemble has a fixed number of particles N, a fixed volume V, and a fixed energy E.
Canonical ensemble (NVT): the ensemble has a fixed number of particles N, a fixed volume V, and a fixed temperature T.
Isothermal-isobaric ensemble (NPT): the ensemble has a fixed number of particles N, a fixed volume V, and a fixed energy E.
Generalized ensembles: use of multiple ensembles, typically run in parallel, to overcome multipl-minima problems.
